name: Judgement Day (TWO TONE COLORS)
description:
"I'll be back" a famous line from Terminator 2 - Judgement Day.
I have nothing to type, but this movie kinda stuck in my brain till now, bcos the TV station in my country back then always played this and I watched it with my family.
From the opening chase scene - in which young Connor, on a fast motorcycle, outruns T-1000, at the wheel of a semi - “Terminator 2” develops a close relationship between the young boy and the good Terminator.

So here illustration I made as a huge fan of Schwarzenegger!
As usual, im using pointilism techniques and colorized it intended to ruin your eyes.
ENJOY!
